text:
@brithume And @NYGovCuomo is the Democrats poster child for leadership for the #WuhanVirus.

He encouraged travel on March 9th and told NY to live your lives.

He said 'what can I do with 400 ventilators, I need 40,000'. He didn't.

His state has 25% of the cases and 30% of deaths.

Wow!
